short_summary: Posting Engagement: Accommodation requirements for the Cadet Activity Program (CAP)
description: The <Department of National Defence (DND)> under the <Cadet Activity Program (CAP)> is looking for
tags: Hotels and lodging and meeting facilities
full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement**
====================

### Solicitation Number
WS4035909463

### Tender Title
Accommodations for Cadet Activity Program (CAP) in North Bay, Ontario

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the provision of a suitable facility for the Cadet Activity Program (CAP) in North Bay, Ontario. The CAP event is scheduled to take place between July 31, 2023, and August 21, 2023. The facility must meet the needs of the participating cadets.

### Important Submission Details
* Tender Closing Date: June 19, 2023, at 14:00:00 EDT
* All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery
* Late bids will not be accepted

### Solicitation Information
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: June 14, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 11, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired

### Solicitation Documents
* The solicitation document is available on Ariba Discovery
* The solicitation document includes detailed information about the project scope, requirements, and evaluation criteria

### Contact Information
* Andrew Denbeigh, Program Manager, 
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (Currently not available)
* Fax: (Currently not available)

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) 

### Regions of Delivery
The contract will be delivered in the following region: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

Note: I have removed all the redundant information and formatted the text
